title: spack incorrectly populates compilers.yaml
body:
`spack` makes a mistake in setting `cc/cxx` paths while populating `compilers.yaml` for a compiler built by spack.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```
[sajid@xrm ~]$ spack find
==> 16 installed packages
-- linux-rhel7-ivybridge / gcc@4.8.5 ----------------------------
autoconf@2.69    gmp@6.1.2        m4@1.4.18    perl@5.30.0
automake@1.16.1  isl@0.18         mpc@1.1.0    pkgconf@1.6.3
gcc@8.3.0        libsigsegv@2.12  mpfr@3.1.6   readline@8.0
gdbm@1.18.1      libtool@2.4.6    ncurses@6.1  zlib@1.2.11
[sajid@xrm ~]$ spack load gcc@8.3.0
[sajid@xrm ~]$ spack compiler find
==> Added 1 new compiler to /raid/home/sajid/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml
    gcc@8.3.0
==> Compilers are defined in the following files:
    /raid/home/sajid/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml
[sajid@xrm ~]$ cat .spack/linux/compilers.yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/clang
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/clang++
      f77:
      fc:
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: clang@3.4.2
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@4.8.5
- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/gcc44
      cxx: /usr/bin/g++44
      f77:
      fc:
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@4.4.7

- compiler:
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++
      f77: /raid/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ivybridge/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-8.3.0-32v3hldcu2eoz5rsbwbyaz3xerqnogyy/bin/gfortran
      fc: /raid/home/sajid/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-ivybridge/gcc-4.8.5/gcc-8.3.0-32v3hldcu2eoz5rsbwbyaz3xerqnogyy/bin/gfortran
    operating_system: rhel7
    target: x86_64
    modules: []
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    spec: gcc@8.3.0
[sajid@xrm ~]$
```

I didn't notice that `spack` made a mistake for `gcc@4.8.5` but it didn't affect me because I was able to compile `gcc@8.3.0`.  

### Information on your system
```
[sajid@xrm ~]$ uname -a
Linux xrm 3.10.0-693.5.2.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Oct 13 10:46:25 EDT 2017 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
[sajid@xrm ~]$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Red Hat Enterprise Linux Workstation release 7.4 (Maipo)
[sajid@xrm ~]$
```

Related to : https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/3331
